publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1217 Brian Adam: Aberdeen Schools' Chess Success-That the Parliament congratulates the two teams from Aberdeen who came first and third at the Girls Team and Individual Chess Championships in Dunkeld and commends the players from Smithfield, Middlefield, Quarryhill, Bramble Brae and St Margaret's schools for their efforts.

S2M-1217 Brian Adam: Aberdeen Schools' Chess Success-That the Parliament congratulates the two teams from Aberdeen who came first and third at the Girls Team and Individual Chess Championships in Dunkeld and commends the players from Smithfield, Middlefield, Quarryhill, Bramble Brae and St Margaret's schools for their efforts.
S2M-1217 Aberdeen Schools' Chess Success (lodged on 27 April 2004) Mr Jamie Stone*, Ms Sandra White*, Shiona Baird*, Mrs Nanette Milne*
S2M-1217 Aberdeen Schools' Chess Success (lodged on 27 April 2004) Tommy Sheridan*, Robin Harper*, Stewart Stevenson*
S2M-1217 Aberdeen Schools' Chess Success (lodged on 27 April 2004) Michael Matheson*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-1217 Aberdeen Schools' Chess Success (lodged on 27 April 2004) Rosie Kane*
